languages.text: Обвязавшись веревками и подбадривая друг друга боевыми кличами, блюстители живыми цепями устремились к сражению. Не видя во тьме и клубящемся снеге ничего впереди, они, тем не менее, приблизились к источнику чудовищного грома битвы.

Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.
languages.original_text: Обвязавшись веревками и подбадривая друг друга боевыми кличами, блюстители живыми цепями устремились к сражению. Не видя во тьме и клубящемся снеге ничего впереди, они, тем не менее, приблизились к источнику чудовищного грома битвы.

traits.locale_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

languages.text: 所有队员互相牵着绳子，组成了一道人墙，高声呐喊着冲向了战场。在黑暗与纷飞的暴雪之中，他们根本看不到任何东西，只能目不视物地大步朝前走去，赶往可怕的呼喊声传来的方向。
languages.original_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

traits.locale_text: 所有队员互相牵着绳子，组成了一道人墙，高声呐喊着冲向了战场。在黑暗与纷飞的暴雪之中，他们根本看不到任何东西，只能目不视物地大步朝前走去，赶往可怕的呼喊声传来的方向。

languages.text: ロープで結び付き、鬨の声で互いを鼓舞したエンフォーサーは人間の鎖となって戦闘へと突入する。暗闇と渦巻く雪で先は何も見えず、視界を遮られたまま、ぞっとする稲妻が走る戦地へと大股で歩みを進める。
languages.original_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

traits.locale_text: ロープで結び付き、鬨の声で互いを鼓舞したエンフォーサーは人間の鎖となって戦闘へと突入する。暗闇と渦巻く雪で先は何も見えず、視界を遮られたまま、ぞっとする稲妻が走る戦地へと大股で歩みを進める。

languages.text: El personal de seguridad, atado con cuerdas y animándose los unos a los otros con gritos de guerra, se apresuran a la batalla con humanas cadenas. Incapaces de ver nada en la oscuridad y la nieve arremolinada, avanzan a ciegas hacia el origen del acre estruendo de la batalla.
languages.original_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

traits.locale_text: El personal de seguridad, atado con cuerdas y animándose los unos a los otros con gritos de guerra, se apresuran a la batalla con humanas cadenas. Incapaces de ver nada en la oscuridad y la nieve arremolinada, avanzan a ciegas hacia el origen del acre estruendo de la batalla.

languages.text: Encordés les uns aux autres, les prévôts se précipitent vers le combat en poussant des cris de guerre pour s'encourager mutuellement. Incapables de percer l'obscurité et la neige tourbillonnante, ils avancent à l'aveuglette vers la source du fracas assourdissant des armes.
languages.original_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

traits.locale_text: Encordés les uns aux autres, les prévôts se précipitent vers le combat en poussant des cris de guerre pour s'encourager mutuellement. Incapables de percer l'obscurité et la neige tourbillonnante, ils avancent à l'aveuglette vers la source du fracas assourdissant des armes.

languages.text: Die Enforcers werden mit Seilen gesichert und unterstützen einander mit Kampfrufen. So stürmen sie als Menschenkette auf den Kampf zu. Da sie in der Dunkelheit und dem Schneegestöber nichts sehen, eilen sie blind auf den monströsen Schlachtenlärm zu.
languages.original_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcers werden mit Seilen gesichert und unterstützen einander mit Kampfrufen. So stürmen sie als Menschenkette auf den Kampf zu. Da sie in der Dunkelheit und dem Schneegestöber nichts sehen, eilen sie blind auf den monströsen Schlachtenlärm zu.

languages.text: Halatlarla birbirine bağlı, savaş naralarıyla birbirine güç aşılayan infazcılar; insan zinciri hâlinde savaşa doğru ilerliyor. Karanlık ve kar fırtınası yüzünden önünü göremeyen grup, savaşın gürültüsüne körlemesine gidiyor.
languages.original_text: Tied together with ropes and bolstering each other with battle cries, the enforcers rush toward the battle in human chains. Unable to see anything ahead in the darkness and swirling snow, they blindly stride toward the source of the battle's monstrous thunder.

traits.locale_text: Halatlarla birbirine bağlanmış ve savaş naralarıyla birbirine güç veren infazcılar, insan zinciri hâlinde savaşa doğru ilerlediler. Karanlık ve kar fırtınası yüzünden önünü göremeyen grup, kör bir hâlde savaşın gürlemesine doğru ilerledi.
